Title: Marvin Gerard (No. 80)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Daniel Knauf (teleplay by), Brandon Sonnier (teleplay by), Brandon Margolis (teleplay by), J.R. Orci (story by), Lukas Reiter (story by), Brandon Margolis (executive story editor), Brandon Sonnier (executive story editor), Brian Studler (executive story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: As Liz pleads for her safety in the Russian Embassy, Red discovers a new plan devised by the Cabal to kill her. A familiar face reaches out to Ressler.
